name: AnimaZoo: Liga-Liga
description:
Race the clock to connect patterns of 3 or more matching animals.

Features:

• Pleasant, child-friendly background music
• Cute animal graphics of parrots, giraffes, pandas, and lions; after level 15, the game starts to add additional animals to make strategy even more challenging
• Landscape view
• Pattern resets if you take too long to find a matching pattern
• Ability to pause the game
• Drag your finger to connect adjacent matching animals to score points
• Two minutes to complete each level
• Each level has an increasing score goal

o Level 1: 1000 points
o Level 2: 2000 points
o Level 3: 3000 points
o Etc.

• Game cheers you on as you complete each level
• If you don’t meet your score goal, try that round again!
As you progress, you will find more and more ways to connect a greater number of animals in each set! This addicting game is targeted to younger audiences, but even adults will find themselves wanting to beat just one more level.
